title: The PlayStation Games You Need To Play In 2016
description:
Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

transcript_chunks.text: bonjourno kind of funny fan it's me Greg Miller and I'm in front of a GameStop not for real but kind of in the screen thing uh we had a cool opportunity Tim somehow talked to GameStop and they said hey would you like to put videos in GameStops and do like content and make little videos for us and we were like sure is there any money and they're like no this is you just want to do some cool content we're like oh okay yeah we like cool content so we made these videos for GameStop to run in GameStop stores which is kind of a big deal for Five Guys working out of a really cool studio in San Francisco so rather than just put him there and have you never see them we thought we'd put them here but I need to put a bump in front of it cuz I say a lot of stuff about GameStop in there but if you're just on YouTube you're like I don't I don't care about that so you're about to watch a video that airs in GameStop if you ever see it in a GameStop you need to take a selfie of yourself with it playing

on YouTube you're like I don't I don't care about that so you're about to watch a video that airs in GameStop if you ever see it in a GameStop you need to take a selfie of yourself with it playing behind you and then enjoy it what's up everybody I'm Greg Miller from kind of funny.com and I just so happen to co-host the world's most popular PlayStation podcast called PS I love you XOXO it posts every Tuesday morning so why not click over to youtube.com/ kindof funnygames And subscribe anyway GameStop asked me to talk about games so I figured I'd toss out the games you have got to play on playstation in 2016 now these aren't my favorite games of the year these are just ones you have to play if you want to be respected by shui Yoshida and don't we all let's start with the Last Guardian yep it's not even out as I'm recording this so I have no idea if it's good or bad but come on it's the last Guardian after a decade it's finally coming out of Japan and we're going to know if it's even

it's not even out as I'm recording this so I have no idea if it's good or bad but come on it's the last Guardian after a decade it's finally coming out of Japan and we're going to know if it's even coming close to the pedestal Eco and Shadow the classes are on will this tortured game about a bird dog cat thing and its boy tug at our heartstrings or be a gigantic waste of our time in PlayStation's money find out on December 6th or now if you're watching it after December 6th I hate when you see videos like this and they're talking about release dates and the release dates already passed they said coming soon so if you're in the future hello future how did the election turn out next up is overcooked yep I'm putting a goofy little game from the PlayStation Network on here so grab yourself a PSN card before you leave the store you see for a long time old Gamers like me have been complaining about the death of couch Co-op you know playing next to a friend sitting on the same couch as you

PSN card before you leave the store you see for a long time old Gamers like me have been complaining about the death of couch Co-op you know playing next to a friend sitting on the same couch as you right there besides doing local kind of multiplayer stuff well overcooked brings that back by challenging you and a pal to chop veggies cook burgers and be the fastest short order Cooks around on top of that overcook gives you some really strict time restraints that'll have you screaming at your bestie in no time but this is a good thing I swear now here's where I cheat and say Batman you say which Batman game and I say all of them seriously 2016 has been a great year for the Dark Knight you can get your combo meter as high as possible in The Amazing Batman Arkham Asylum and Arkham City via Batman return to Arkham you can make choices that drastically changed the Bruce Wayne Mythos in Batman The Telltale series or you can become the bat in Batman Arkham VR whether it's action story or

Batman return to Arkham you can make choices that drastically changed the Bruce Wayne Mythos in Batman The Telltale series or you can become the bat in Batman Arkham VR whether it's action story or immersion Batman's got you covered now let's toss in an odd little masch up here okay let's talk about Dragon Quest Builders here square anx is taking the Beloved RPG world of Dragon Quest and mashing it up with the mechanics of Minecraft what we get here is an adorable Builder that isn't super challenging but is super endearing you create towns take quests and even double back for challenges when your adventure takes you to a brand new space and how could I Greg Miller talk about PlayStation in 2016 and not mention Uncharted for a thief's end simply put developer naughty do has delivered another classic here we end Nathan Drake's story in an epic adventure that se Sully Nate and even a long lost brother chase a pirate treasure and their past the game's beautiful the action is fierce and

classic here we end Nathan Drake's story in an epic adventure that se Sully Nate and even a long lost brother chase a pirate treasure and their past the game's beautiful the action is fierce and the story as always is magnificent if you've never played an Uncharted before grab that Nathan Drake collection Uncharted 4 and prepare for one of the best franchises in gaming so those are some of my favorite PlayStation games in 2016 but what are yours subscribe to youtube.com/ kindof funny games and tell me in the comments of the next PS I love you XOXO until then it's been my pleasure to serve you an Uncharted 3 is better than Uncharted 2 deal with it
